current-chamber.#text:
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED
		  STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to
		  consolidate the reporting obligations of the Federal Communications Commission
		  in order to improve congressional oversight and reduce reporting
		  burdens.
